timeline.bodyText:
Suggested update:
"Specifies the web application name, for example, <webApp id="sample" name="app1|app2" matchType="notContain"/>."
timeline.author: Charlotte-Holt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,49 +5,48 @@
 #NLS_MESSAGEFORMAT_NONE
 
 authFilter=Authentication Filter
-authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers to determine whether or not the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
+authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers. If all conditions are met, the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
 
 webApp=Web Application
-webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name.
+webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name. For example, <webApp id="sample" name="app1|app2" matchType="notContain"/>

 webApp=Web Application
-webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name.
+webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name. For example, <webApp id="sample" name="app1|app2" matchType="notContain"/>

+requestUrl.desc=Specifies the HTTP request URL. For example, <requestUrl id="sample" urlPattern="/account/checking|/account/saving" matchType="contains" />

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested update:
"Specifies the remote host TCP/IP address of the client application that sent the HTTP request, for example, <remoteAddress id="sample" ip="100.100.100.99" matchType="greaterThan"/>."
timeline.author: Charlotte-Holt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,49 +5,48 @@
 #NLS_MESSAGEFORMAT_NONE
 
 authFilter=Authentication Filter
-authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers to determine whether or not the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
+authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers. If all conditions are met, the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
 
 webApp=Web Application
-webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name.
+webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name. For example, <webApp id="sample" name="app1|app2" matchType="notContain"/>
 
 requestUrl=Request URL
-requestUrl.desc=Specifies the request URL.
+requestUrl.desc=Specifies the HTTP request URL. For example, <requestUrl id="sample" urlPattern="/account/checking|/account/saving" matchType="contains" />
 
 urlPattern=URL pattern
-urlPattern.desc=Specifies the URL pattern.
-
-remoteAddress=Remote Host
-remoteAddress.desc=Specifies the remote host.
+urlPattern.desc=Specifies the URL pattern. The "*", when used as a wildcard, it is not supported.
+remoteAddress=Remote Address
+remoteAddress.desc=Specifies the remote host TCP/IP address of the client application that sent the HTTP request. For example, <remoteAddress id="sample" ip="100.100.100.99" matchType="greaterThan"/>

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not really sure what "it" is referring to in this one.
Should it be:
"Specifies the URL pattern. When the * character is used as a wildcard, the URL pattern is not supported."
Or maybe:
"Specifies the URL pattern. The * character is not supported to be used as a wildcard."
timeline.author: Charlotte-Holt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,49 +5,48 @@
 #NLS_MESSAGEFORMAT_NONE
 
 authFilter=Authentication Filter
-authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers to determine whether or not the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
+authFilter.desc= Specifies a selection rule that represents conditions that are matched against the HTTP request headers. If all conditions are met, the HTTP request is selected for the authentication.
 
 webApp=Web Application
-webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name.
+webApp.desc=Specifies the web application name. For example, <webApp id="sample" name="app1|app2" matchType="notContain"/>
 
 requestUrl=Request URL
-requestUrl.desc=Specifies the request URL.
+requestUrl.desc=Specifies the HTTP request URL. For example, <requestUrl id="sample" urlPattern="/account/checking|/account/saving" matchType="contains" />
 
 urlPattern=URL pattern
-urlPattern.desc=Specifies the URL pattern.
-
-remoteAddress=Remote Host
-remoteAddress.desc=Specifies the remote host.
+urlPattern.desc=Specifies the URL pattern. The "*", when used as a wildcard, it is not supported.

replies.bodyText: "Specifies the URL pattern. The * character is not supported to be used as a wildcard."
replies.author: utle

timeline.bodyText:
